entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
